mapper.select: select U.customer_id as id, U.customer_password as password, U.customer_type as type, U.customer_name as name, U.customer_birthday as birthday, U.customer_zipcode as zipcode, U.customer_basic_address as basicAddress, U.customer_detail_address as detailAddress, U.customer_phone as phone, U.customer_email as email, U.customer_deleted as deleted, U.customer_created_date as createdDate, U.customer_updated_date as updatedDate from customers U where U.customer_id = #{value}
